item.title: R Markdown Cheat Sheet
item.description: R Markdown Cheat Sheet This post provides a quick reference for R Markdown syntax, including: Headers and formatting Code chunks Inline code Tables and lists Links and images Example: Code Chunk # This is an R code chunk summary(cars) Useful Links R Markdown: The Definitive Guide RStudio Cheat Sheets Feel free to download the PDF version or view the source code.
